analyzed: yongs su dgyes pa tshad med pa mnga' bas na dgyes pa che'o //
translated: Since he has immeasurable delight, he is Great Delight.

original: rab tu dga' bas byed par mdzad pas na legs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu dga' bas byed par mdzad pas na legs zhes bya'o //
translated: Since he acts with great joy, he is called Excellent.

original: shin tu mnyes pas na rab mnyes pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu mnyes pas na rab mnyes pa'o //

original: spro ba'i tshe na thams cad du khyad par mdzad pas na mnyes pa che zhing ngo //
analyzed: spro ba'i tshe na thams cad du khyad par mdzad pas na mnyes pa che zhing ngo //

analyzed: skye dgu rnams dga' bar mdzad pas na dgyes pa che'o //
translated: Since he delights beings, he is Great Delight.

original: shin tu dga' bskyed par mdzad pas na rab dgyes so //
analyzed: shin tu dga' bskyed par mdzad pas na rab dgyes so //
translated: Since he generates great joy, he is Very Joyful.

analyzed: rdo rje mtshan pa'i rin po che'i gzugs mnga' bas na rdo rje rin chen no //
translated: Since he has the form of a jewel marked with a vajra, he is Vajra Jewel.

original: bdag po'i rgyur gyur pas na rgyal po che'o //
analyzed: bdag po'i rgyur gyur pas na rgyal po che'o //
translated: Since he is the cause of being a lord, he is Great King.

original: dbang bskur ba yang yin la bzang po yang yin pas na dbang bskur bzang po'o //

analyzed: rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas na rin chen thams cad do //
translated: It is all jewels because it is the source of all jewels.

original: shas cher mdzes par mdzad pas na mdzes pa che'o //
analyzed: shas cher mdzes par mdzad pas na mdzes pa che'o //
translated: It is a great beauty because it makes a great beauty.

original: sems can thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pas na rnams rgyan no //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pas na rnams rgyan no //
translated: It is an ornament of all beings because it is the ornament of all beings.

original: mi phyed ba'i gzi brjid mnga' bas na rdo rje gzi brjid do ;
analyzed: mi phyed ba'i gzi brjid mnga' bas na rdo rje gzi brjid do ;
translated: It is a vajra splendor because it has an indivisible splendor.

original: / spro ba'i dus na gzi brjid kyis khyab par mdzad pas na gzi brid che'o //
analyzed: / spro ba'i dus na gzi brjid kyis khyab par mdzad pas na gzi brid che'o //
translated: It is a great splendor because it spreads splendor at the time of expansion.

original: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po mnga' bas na 'od che'o //
analyzed: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po mnga' bas na 'od che'o //
translated: It is a great light because it has a vast orb of light.

original: yang na 'do chen po mnga' bas na 'od che'o //üîΩlha ma me ba chen po mnga' ba'i phyir lha ma me ba chen po ste lha ma pa ni gzim dang sa la bya'o //

original: 'di la 'bar ba chen po mnga' bas na 'bar ba che'o //
analyzed: 'di la 'bar ba chen po mnga' bas na 'bar ba che'o //
translated: He is the great blazing one because he possesses great radiance.

original: byang chub tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od yin pas na sangs rgyas 'od do //
analyzed: byang chub tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od yin pas na sangs rgyas 'od do //
translated: He is the light of the Buddhas because he is the light of the Perfectly Awakened Ones.

original: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan mnga' bas na rdo rje rgyal mtshan te rgyal mtshan @200b la bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan mnga' bas na rdo rje rgyal mtshan te rgyal mtshan @200b la bya'o //
translated: He is the vajra banner because he possesses a banner marked with a vajra.

original: spro ba'i dus na thams cad du khyad pas na dpal che ba'o //
analyzed: spro ba'i dus na thams cad du khyad pas na dpal che ba'o //
translated: He is the great glory because he is the glory of all.

analyzed: chen po rnams kyi mtshan ma yin pas na rgyal mtshan che'o //
translated: He is the great banner because he is the sign of the great ones.

original: sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas na nor rab gtong ngo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas na nor rab gtong ngo //

original: nam mkha' las byung bas na nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan no //
analyzed: nam mkha' las byung bas na nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan no //
translated: He is the banner of the sky because he is born from the sky.

original: spro ba'i che na thams cad du khyab pas na yu ba che'o //
analyzed: spro ba'i che na thams cad du khyab pas na yu ba che'o //
translated: He is the great shaft because he pervades all with his radiance.

original: gtong ba'i rgyu yin pas na gtong ba'i rgyal mtshan no //
analyzed: gtong ba'i rgyu yin pas na gtong ba'i rgyal mtshan no //
translated: It is the banner of giving, because it is the cause of giving.

original: mi phyed pa'i bzhad pa yin pas na rdo rje bzhad pa'o //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i bzhad pa yin pas na rdo rje bzhad pa'o //
translated: It is the vajra laugh, because it is the indivisible laugh.

original: phyogs thams cad 'gengs pas na bzhad pa che'o //
analyzed: phyogs thams cad 'gengs pas na bzhad pa che'o //
translated: It is the great laugh, because it fills all directions.

original: dga' ba mnga' ba'i rgyur gyur pas na dgyes pa che'o //
analyzed: dga' ba mnga' ba'i rgyur gyur pas na dgyes pa che'o //
translated: It is the great joy, because it is the cause of the experience of joy.

original: chos kyi ro myong ba'i dga' ba dang mgu bskyed par mdzad pas na rab dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi ro myong ba'i dga' ba dang mgu bskyed par mdzad pas na rab dgyes pa'o //
translated: It is the great delight, because it produces the joy and delight of the taste of the Dharma.

original: shin tu dgyes pa'i shugs kyi rgyur gyur pas na dgyes pa'i shugs so //
analyzed: shin tu dgyes pa'i shugs kyi rgyur gyur pas na dgyes pa'i shugs so //
translated: It is the rapture, because it is the cause of the force of great joy.

original: khyad par du dga' ba'i rgyur gyur pas na rol cing dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par du dga' ba'i rgyur gyur pas na rol cing dgyes pa'o //
translated: It is the play and delight, because it is the cause of special joy.

original: chos kyi yul dga' ba'i rgyur gyur pas na chos dgyes so //
analyzed: chos kyi yul dga' ba'i rgyur gyur pas na chos dgyes so //
translated: It is the Dharma delight, because it is the cause of the joy of the object of Dharma.

original: mi phyed pa'i chos mnga' bas na rdo rje chos so //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i chos mnga' bas na rdo rje chos so //
translated: It is the vajra Dharma, because it possesses the indivisible Dharma.

analyzed: spros pa'i dus na na thams cad du khyad par mdzad pas na chos che ba'o //
translated: It is the great Dharma, because it is the special Dharma in all the times of proliferation.

original: sems can gyi yul du thugs rje'i chos mnga' bas na sems dpa'i chos so //
analyzed: sems can gyi yul du thugs rje'i chos mnga' bas na sems dpa'i chos so //
translated: It is the Dharma of the sentient being, because it possesses the Dharma of compassion in the realm of sentient beings.

original: rang bzhin gyis dag pas na rab sbyong ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dag pas na rab sbyong ba'o //
translated: It is the best of all purifications because it is pure by nature.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos yin pas na sangs rgyas chos so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos yin pas na sangs rgyas chos so //
translated: It is the Dharma of the Buddhas because it is the Dharma of the Buddhas.

original: theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnag bzhin yin pas na chos rab mchog go //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnag bzhin yin pas na chos rab mchog go //
translated: It is the best of all Dharmas because it is the nature of the Dharma of the Great Vehicle.

original: sems can thams cad la byams pa dang ldan pas na 'dod chos so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la byams pa dang ldan pas na 'dod chos so //
translated: It is the Dharma of desire because it is endowed with love for all beings.

original: mi phyed pa'i shes rab mnga' bas na rdo rje rnon po'o //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i shes rab mnga' bas na rdo rje rnon po'o //
translated: It is the sharp vajra because it has indivisible wisdom.

original: spros pa'i dus na thams cad du khyad par mdzad pas ral gri che'o //
analyzed: spros pa'i dus na thams cad du khyad par mdzad pas ral gri che'o //
translated: It is the great sword because it acts everywhere at the time of elaboration.

analyzed: shes rab dang ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na shes rab ye shes so //
translated: It is the wisdom sword because it is the essence of wisdom and intuition.

original: blo gros chen po mnga' bas na blo gris che'o //
analyzed: blo gros chen po mnga' bas na blo gris che'o //
translated: It is the great intellect because it has a great intellect.

original: sdig pa'i bdag nyid gcod par mdzad pas na sdig gcod do //
analyzed: sdig pa'i bdag nyid gcod par mdzad pas na sdig gcod do //
translated: It is the cutter of evil because it cuts off evil.

original: tshad med pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri yin pas ral gri che'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri yin pas ral gri che'o //
translated: It is the great sword because it is the immeasurable sword of wisdom.

original: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi mtshon gyis nyon mongs pa'i dgra bo gcod par mdzad pas na sangs rgyas mtshon no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi mtshon gyis nyon mongs pa'i dgra bo gcod par mdzad pas na sangs rgyas mtshon no //
translated: Because the Blessed Buddhas are the Buddhas, since they cut the enemy of the afflictions with the sword of wisdom.

original: mi phyed pa'i rgyu yin pas na rdo rje rgyu'o //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i rgyu yin pas na rdo rje rgyu'o //
translated: It is the cause of the vajra, since it is the cause of the indivisible.

original: spros pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor thams cad la khyad bas na 'khor lo che'o //
analyzed: spros pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor thams cad la khyad bas na 'khor lo che'o //
translated: It is the great wheel, since it is preeminent in all the ma·πá·∏çalas at the time of elaboration.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin yin bas na sangs rgyas 'khor lo'o //üîΩyon tan thams @201a * //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin yin bas na sangs rgyas 'khor lo'o // yon tan thams @201a * //
translated: It is the wheel of the Buddhas, since it is the nature of the wheel of Dharma.

original: cad kyi gter du gyur pas na gter chen po'o //
analyzed: cad kyi gter du gyur pas na gter chen po'o //
translated: It is the great treasure, since it is the treasure of all good qualities.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad sdud pa la 'jug par mdzad pas na dkyil 'khor kun no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad sdud pa la 'jug par mdzad pas na dkyil 'khor kun no //
translated: It is all ma·πá·∏çalas, since it engages in the collection of all ma·πá·∏çalas.

original: sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog yin pas na chos mchog go //
analyzed: sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog yin pas na chos mchog go //
translated: It is the supreme Dharma, since it is the supreme of the modes of mantra conduct.

original: sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin yin pas na chos kyi 'khor lo yin pa'i phyir ram 'khor lo'i rgyur gyur pas na chos kyi 'khor lo'o //

translated: It is the wheel of Dharma, since it is the nature of the Dharma that causes Buddhahood, or since it is the cause of the wheel.

analyzed: thogs pa med pa'i gsung mnga' bas na rdo rje gsungs ngo //
translated: Since he has unimpeded speech, he is the vajra speech.

original: phyogs thams cad khyab pa'i gsung mnga' bas na gsung ba che'o //
analyzed: phyogs thams cad khyab pa'i gsung mnga' bas na gsung ba che'o //
translated: Since his speech pervades all directions, it is great speech.

original: spros pa thams cad dang bral bas na spros med do //
analyzed: spros pa thams cad dang bral bas na spros med do //
translated: Since he is free from all conceptual elaborations, he is non-elaborate.

original: yi ge chen po mnga' bas na yi ge che ste sgra rnams nyid yin no //
analyzed: yi ge chen po mnga' bas na yi ge che ste sgra rnams nyid yin no //
translated: Since he has the great letters, he is the great letter, which are the sounds themselves.

original: don dam par 'di la 'gyur ba med pas na yi ge med pa ste dam pa'i yi ge che zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don dam par 'di la 'gyur ba med pas na yi ge med pa ste dam pa'i yi ge che zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since ultimately there is no change in him, he is the letterless, which means the great letter of the ultimate.

original: tshad med pa'i bzlas pa mnga' bas na bzlas pa che'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i bzlas pa mnga' bas na bzlas pa che'o //
translated: Since he has immeasurable recitation, he is the great recitation.

original: sangs rgyas kyi gsung mnga' bas na sangs rgyas gsung ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi gsung mnga' bas na sangs rgyas gsung ngo //
translated: Since he has the speech of the Buddha, he is the Buddha's speech.

original: mi phyed pa'i phrin las mnga' bas na rdo rje las so ;
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i phrin las mnga' bas na rdo rje las so ;
translated: Since he has indivisible activity, he is the vajra activity.

original: / las bzang bo rnams kyi nang na yang mchod pa'i las mchog yin pas na las rab mchog go //
analyzed: / las bzang bo rnams kyi nang na yang mchod pa'i las mchog yin pas na las rab mchog go //
translated: Since the activity of worship is supreme among good activities, he is the supreme activity.

analyzed: mchod pa'i las kyis thams cad du khyab par mdzad pas na las chen no //
translated: Since he pervades all with the activity of worship, he is the great activity.

original: bzang po'i las rnams mdzad pas na las rab byed pa'o //
analyzed: bzang po'i las rnams mdzad pas na las rab byed pa'o //
translated: He is the one who performs the best actions, because he performs good actions.

original: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na gsang ba'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na gsang ba'i mchod pa'o //
translated: He is the secret worship, because he has the nature of secret worship.

original: mchod pa'i las kyi khyad par mang po mnga' bas na mchod pa che'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i las kyi khyad par mang po mnga' bas na mchod pa che'o //
translated: He is the great worship, because he has many special actions of worship.

analyzed: bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na sangs rgyas mchod pa'o //
translated: He is the worship of the Buddhas, because he has the nature of worship with incense, etc.

original: mi phyed pa'i srung ba yin pas na rdo rje srung ba'o //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i srung ba yin pas na rdo rje srung ba'o //
translated: He is the vajra protection, because he is the indivisible protection.

original: spros pa'i dus na phyogs thams cad du khyab par mdzad pas na go cha che'o //
analyzed: spros pa'i dus na phyogs thams cad du khyab par mdzad pas na go cha che'o //
translated: He is the great armor, because he pervades all directions at the time of elaboration.

original: go cha thams cad kyi nang na dam par gyur pas na go cha'i mchog go //
analyzed: go cha thams cad kyi nang na dam par gyur pas na go cha'i mchog go //
translated: He is the supreme armor, because he is the best of all armors.

original: mi phyed pa'i chos can yin pas na brtan pa che'o //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i chos can yin pas na brtan pa che'o //
translated: He is the great firmness, because he has the nature of indivisibility.

original: sems can gyi tshogs tshad med pa yang dag par srung bar mdzad pas na srung ba che'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi tshogs tshad med pa yang dag par srung bar mdzad pas na srung ba che'o //
translated: He is the great protection, because he truly protects the immeasurable hosts of sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin yin pas na snying rje che'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin yin pas na snying rje che'o //
translated: He is the great compassion, because he has the nature of the Buddha qualities.

original: sangs rgyas kyi brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas na sangs rgyas brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas na sangs rgyas brtson 'grus so //
translated: The Buddha's effort is of the nature of irreversibility, so it is the Buddha's effort.

original: mi phyed pas na rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
analyzed: mi phyed pas na rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
translated: It is the vajra yaksha because it is indivisible.

original: spros pa'i dus na thams cad du khyab pas na khro ba che'o //
analyzed: spros pa'i dus na thams cad du khyab pas na khro ba che'o //
translated: It is the great wrath because it pervades everywhere at the time of elaboration.

original: ma rungs pa thams cad kyi gzugs su ston pas na ma rungs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: ma rungs pa thams cad kyi gzugs su ston pas na ma rungs pa thams cad do //
translated: It is all the evil ones because it displays the forms of all the evil ones.

original: sems @201b can thams cad 'jigs pa skyed par byed pas na skrag par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sems @201b can thams cad 'jigs pa skyed par byed pas na skrag par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the terrifier because it generates fear in all sentient beings.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun no //

analyzed: ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs kyi mchog yin pas na thabs chen no //
translated: It is the great means because it is the supreme means of subduing all the evil ones.

original: thams cad la 'khor bo'i gzugs su ston pas na srung ba mchog go //
analyzed: thams cad la 'khor bo'i gzugs su ston pas na srung ba mchog go //
translated: It is the supreme protection because it displays the form of a retinue to all.

original: mi phyed pa'i khu tshur yin pas na rdo rje bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i khu tshur yin pas na rdo rje bsdus pa'o //
translated: It is the vajra gathering because it is an indivisible fist.

original: phyag rgya thams cad dam spros pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams cad khyab pas na phyag rgya che'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya thams cad dam spros pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams cad khyab pas na phyag rgya che'o //
translated: It is a great seal because it pervades all world systems when all seals are expanded.
